channel.title: CVE Feed for Xiaomi -- Xiaomi Router AX9000
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xiaomi -- Xiaomi Router AX9000

item.title: CVE-2024-45348|2024-09-23T15:36:16.866Z -- xiaomi -- xiaomi%20router%20ax9000
item.description: Xiaomi Router AX9000 has a post-authorization command injection vulnerability. This vulnerability is caused by the lack of validation of user input, and an attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.
